name: Frame It
details: This is an independent photographer's service providing website. A quick overview of this website: The Home Page consists of:- 1. Navbar 2. A static banner 3. Services provided by the photographer himself. 4. A preview of some of his work on 5. A Footer 5. Sub-nested bullet etc 6. All the services takes to a checkout page which is done by dynamic routing This Checkout Page is basic form where there is a button that displays a toast. Also the Signup and Login form is done with the help of Firebase Authentication. Technologies used:- React Routing, React Firebase Hooking, React Toastify ,React bootstrap, Firebase Authrntication, React User Form

name: Door2Door
details: This is an warehouse management website. A quick overview of this website: The Home Page consists of:- 1. Navbar 2. A static banner with a fixed image on th background with an animation 3. Items of the warehouse named Door2Door which is coming from backend through an api call 4. A quick overview of Door2Door 5. A Footer 5. SA query section 6.Footer. Each of the Items takes to a page which is done by dynamic routing, where you can see detailed information of the clicked item. There is also a Manage Inventory page where all the items are kept in tabluar form Technologies used:- React Routing, React Firebase Hooking, React Toastify ,React bootstrap, Firebase Authrntication, AOS Animation, MongoDB, Node, Express, Sweet Alert, React Reveal

name: Tech World
details: This is an independent photographer's service providing website. A quick overview of this website: The Home Page consists of:- 1. Navbar 2. A static banner 3. Items of the manufacturer parts which is coming from backend through an api call 4. A Bussiness Summary 5. A Footer 5. Sub-nested bullet etc 6. A Delivery steps. Each of the Items takes to a page which is done by dynamic routing, where you can see detailed information of the clicked item. Technologies used:- React Routing, React Firebase Hooking, React Toastify ,React bootstrap, Firebase Authrntication, AOS Animation, MongoDB, Node, Express, Sweet Alert, React Reveal, React User Form
